communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

1. On 2023-02-15 around 16:42, CVPD responded to a call for service categorized as a Suspicious Person	near 400 Oaklawn Ave. The incident number is 230215L00013742 or CVL013742.  I am looking for any call detail log, incident report ( including a narrative summary), investigatory report, arrest report, 911 audio recording, or log of drone activity for this event.

2. On 2023-03-18 around 09:38:00, CVPD responded to a call for service categorized as Domestic Violence	OR a Disturbance - General near 400 Oaklawn Ave. The incident number is 230318L00023167 or CVL23167.  I am looking for any call detail log, incident report ( including a narrative summary), investigatory report, arrest report, 911 audio recording, or log of drone activity for this event.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Dhruv Mehrotra
